bug.author: LaurentBerger
bug.description:
at line <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Itseez/opencv/blob/master/modules/videoio/src/cap_mjpeg_decoder.cpp#L557>https://github.com/Itseez/opencv/blob/master/modules/videoio/src/cap_mjpeg_decoder.cpp#L557</denchmark-link>
It should be m_height = avi_hdr.dwHeight ; instead of m_height = avi_hdr.dwWidth;

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/LaurentBerger>@LaurentBerger</denchmark-link> : thanks for reporting. this issue can be closed
